Find out how your MP votes on the issues you care about.

Every week, a dozen or so times, your MP votes on changes to Australian law. This is their definitive exercise of power on your behalf.

In order to know whether your MP is representing your views on the issues, you need to know how they’ve voted.

The Public Whip lets you see all their votes so you can hold them to account.

About the Project

The Public Whip is brought to you by the not-for-profit OpenAustralia Foundation. It is based on the UK site of the same name.

If you'd like to talk to us about the project, please email us.
